np.random.shuffle.description: Randomly shuffles the elements of an array in-place.

attributes.name: x
attributes.description: The array or sequence to shuffle.

attributes.name: axis
attributes.description: The axis along which to shuffle.

returns.name: None
returns.description: This function does not return a value.

behavioralNotes: Modifies the input array in place

test.scenario: Demonstrates how shuffle modifies the input array in place.
observations: The input array is modified in place
The length of the array remains the same

np.random.permutation.description: Returns a randomly permuted copy of a sequence or array.

attributes.name: x
attributes.description: The input array or integer specifying the range to permute.

returns.name: ndarray
returns.description: A new array containing a random permutation of the input.

behavioralNotes: Does not modify the input array

test.scenario: Demonstrates that permutation returns a new shuffled array.
observations: The original array is not modified
The returned array has the same elements
guarantees: Returned array is a new object

np.sort.description: Returns a sorted copy of an array.

attributes.name: axis
attributes.description: The axis along which to sort. Default is the last axis.

returns.name: ndarray
returns.description: A sorted copy of the input array.

behavioralNotes: Does not modify the original array

test.scenario: Demonstrates that np.sort returns a sorted copy.
observations: The original array is not modified
A new sorted array is returned

ndarray.sort.description: Sorts the array in place along the specified axis.

attributes.name: axis
attributes.description: The axis along which to sort the array.

returns.name: None
returns.description: This method does not return a value.

behavioralNotes: Faster than np.sort when mutation is acceptable

test.scenario: Demonstrates in-place sorting of an array.
observations: The array is modified in place
Elements are reordered into sorted order

np.reshape.description: Gives a new shape to an array without changing its data.

attributes.name: newshape
attributes.description: The new shape for the array.

returns.name: ndarray
returns.description: An array with the specified shape.

behavioralNotes: May return a view or a copy depending on memory layout
Does not modify the original array
No data is copied if a view is possible

test.scenario: Demonstrates reshaping without changing underlying data.
observations: The shape of the array changes
nonGuarantees: Returning a copy instead of a view

np.copy.description: Returns a shallow copy of an array.

returns.name: ndarray
returns.description: A new array containing a copy of the data.

behavioralNotes: Shallow copy only (object references are shared)
Useful to avoid unintended in-place modification

test.scenario: Demonstrates creation of a shallow copy.
observations: A new array object is created
guarantees: Returned array is a new object
